CompanyDescription: Headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, Stein Mart, Inc. is a national specialty omnichannel off-price retailer offering designer and name-brand fashion apparel, home décor, accessories and shoes at everyday discount prices. Stein Mart provides real value that customers love every day both in stores and online. For more information, please visit www.steinmart.com. Begun in the early 1900s as a single store in Greenville, Mississippi, Stein Mart, Inc. was organized in Mississippi in 1968 before merging into a Florida corporation in 1992. Stein Mart, Inc. operated 283 stores in 30 states and an omnichannel Ecommerce retail selling site as of February 1, 2020. Subsequent to February 1, 2020, we closed two stores, resulting in 281 stores that we operate as of the date of this filing. As used herein, the terms "we," "our," "us," "the Company," and "Stein Mart" refer to Stein Mart, Inc., a Florida corporation, and its wholly-owned subsidiaries.  ... More ...
